LanguageData.BioluminescentSpores.label: bioluminescent spores
LanguageData.BioluminescentSpores.letterText: Some variety of fungus is blossoming, releasing bioluminescent spores! The spores are strangely beautiful and pose no danger.
LanguageData.BoomshroomSprout.label: boomshroom sprout
LanguageData.BoomshroomSprout.letterText:
A cluster of explosive boomshrooms has sprouted nearby!

These mushrooms only grow in darkness. Once they mature, they can be harvested for chemfuel.

Be careful - mature boomshrooms explode if damaged.
LanguageData.Drought.label: drought
LanguageData.DroughtInitial.label: initial drought conditions
LanguageData.GillRot.label: gill rot
LanguageData.LavaEmergence.label: lava emergence
LanguageData.LavaFlow.label: lava flow
LanguageData.OrbitalDebris.label: orbital debris
LanguageData.OrbitalDebris.letterText: A cloud of orbital debris is hurtling towards your position and will impact within seconds. Get your colonists under a roof.
LanguageData.SeasonalFlooding.label: seasonal flooding
LanguageData.VolcanicAsh.label: volcanic ash
LanguageData.VolcanicDebris.label: volcanic debris
LanguageData.VolcanicDebris.letterText: A nearby volcanic eruption is showering the region with molten lava!
